languages.text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}So passes the string of eternities that embodies this repose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le monde ralentit et le temps lui-même se fige pour faire durer éternellement ce moment de répit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le monde ralentit et le temps lui-même se fige pour faire durer éternellement ce moment de répit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mundo se ralentiza y el mismo tiempo se detiene. Este momento de descanso se convierte en una eternidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mundo se ralentiza y el mismo tiempo se detiene. Este momento de descanso se convierte en una eternidad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}世界慢了下来，时间也不再流动。这短暂的小憩不断延伸，直至永恒。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}世界慢了下来，时间也不再流动。这短暂的小憩不断延伸，直至永恒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}世界がゆっくりと静まり、時間そのものが静止した。この一瞬の安息が永遠に続いているかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}世界がゆっくりと静まり、時間そのものが静止した。この一瞬の安息が永遠に続いているかのように。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Welt verlangsamt sich und die Zeit scheint stillzustehen. Dieser Augenblick der Ruhe dehnt sich zu einer Ewigkeit aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Welt verlangsamt sich und die Zeit scheint stillzustehen. Dieser Augenblick der Ruhe dehnt sich zu einer Ewigkeit aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dünya yavaşlıyor ve zaman duruyor. Bu sükûnet anları, sonsuzluğa doğru uzanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The world slows, and time itself goes still as this moment of repose stretches into an eternity.{/n}
